summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Light and Power Plant and System; authorizing the construction of sidewalks along the pipeline right-of-way in the City of Renton, as required by the franchise for the Skagit Transmission line right-of-way; making an appropriation from the Light Department Construction Fund therefor; and authorizing the Acting Superintendent of Lighting to make application for a Federal W. P. A. project therefor.
